query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS admin_email_outbox (
  id VARCHAR(100) PRIMARY KEY,
  sourceId VARCHAR(50),
  sourceName VARCHAR(255),
  toAddress VARCHAR(255),
  ccAddresses TEXT,
  subject VARCHAR(500),
  body TEXT,
  status ENUM('draft', 'sent', 'archived') DEFAULT 'draft',
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  sentAt DATETIME,
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_sourceId (sourceId)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS data_gap_tickets (
  id VARCHAR(100) PRIMARY KEY,
  sourceId VARCHAR(50),
  sourceName VARCHAR(255),
  ticketType ENUM('access_needed', 'data_gap', 'quality_issue') DEFAULT 'data_gap',
  priority ENUM('critical', 'high', 'medium', 'low') DEFAULT 'medium',
  status ENUM('open', 'in_progress', 'resolved', 'wont_fix') DEFAULT 'open',
  description TEXT,
  assignedTo VARCHAR(100),
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_priority (priority),
  INDEX idx_ticketType (ticketType)
);
